get.description:
The TDM Tables endpoint returns information about the TDM Tables.
The list is limited to tables that the requester can access.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth2 token as Bearer type

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Text used to limit results

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Results are ordered by this column number list

parameters.name: startRow
parameters.description: The first row to show, used for paging

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of rows to return, used for paging

200.description: An array of TDM Tables

post.description: Allows authorized user to add new TDM Table definition.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth2 token as Bearer type

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Minimal TDM Table Definition

200.description: Unique table id of created table

delete.description: Allows authorized user to delete TDM Table definitions.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth2 token as Bearer type

parameters.name: tdmTableId
parameters.description: TDM Table ID to delete

200.description: Count of table deleted, if successful = 1

put.description: Allows authorized user to update TDM Table definitions.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth2 token as Bearer type

parameters.name: tdmTableId
parameters.description: TDM Table ID to update

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Minimal TDM Table Definition

200.description: Count of table updated, if successful = 1

get.description: Allows authorized user to retrieve TDM Table definitions by Id.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth2 token as Bearer type

parameters.name: tdmTableId
parameters.description: TDM Table ID to retrieve

200.description: Definition of the retrieved table

get.description: Allows authorized user to retrieve TDM Table definitions by Table Name.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth2 token as Bearer type

parameters.name: tdmTableName
parameters.description: TDM Table Name to retrieve

200.description: Definition of the retrieved table

get.summary: Retrieves a TDM table id using the table name
get.description: Allows authorized user to retrieve TDM Table ID using the Table Name.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth2 token as Bearer type

parameters.name: tdmTableName
parameters.description: TDM Table Name to retrieve

200.description: TDM table id

get.summary: Retrieves a TDM table name using the table ID
get.description: Allows authorized user to retrieve TDM Table Name using the Table ID.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth2 token as Bearer type

parameters.name: tdmTableId
parameters.description: TDM Table ID to retrieve

200.description: TDM table name

get.description:
The TDM columns endpoint returns information about the columns definitions.
The list is limited to columns in the provided table.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth2 token as Bearer type

parameters.name: tdmTableId
parameters.description: TDM Table ID using these columns

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Text used to limit results

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Results are ordered by this column number list

parameters.name: startRow
parameters.description: The first row to show, used for paging

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of rows to return, used for paging

200.description: An array of TDM Column definitions

post.description: Allows authorized user to add new Column definition.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth2 token as Bearer type

parameters.name: tdmTableId
parameters.description: TDM Table ID using these columns

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Column Definition

200.description: Unique column id of created column

get.description:
The TDM columns endpoint returns information about the columns definitions.
The list is limited to columns in the provided table.

parameters.name: tdmTableName

parameters.description: Text used to limit results

post.description: Allows authorized user to add new Column definition.

parameters.name: tdmTableName
parameters.description: TDM Table Name using these columns

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Column Definition

200.description: Unique column id of created column

delete.description: Allows authorized user to delete Column definitions.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth2 token as Bearer type

parameters.name: columnId
parameters.description: Column ID to delete

200.description: Count of column deleted, if successful = 1

put.description: Allows authorized user to update Column definitions.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth2 token as Bearer type

parameters.name: columnId
parameters.description: Column ID to update

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Minimal Column Definition

200.description: Count of columns updated, if successful = 1

get.description: Allows authorized user to retrieve Column definitions by Id.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth2 token as Bearer type

parameters.name: columnId
parameters.description: Column ID to retrieve

200.description: Definition of the retrieved column

get.description: The TDM column types endpoint returns information about the columns types.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth2 token as Bearer type

200.description: An array of TDM Column types

get.description:
The TDM rows endpoint returns the tables rows.
The list is limited by the request parameters.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth2 token as Bearer type

parameters.name: tdmTableId
parameters.description: TDM Table ID having these rows

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Text used to limit results

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Results are ordered by this column number list

parameters.name: startRow
parameters.description: The first row to show, used for paging

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of rows to return, used for paging

parameters.name: includeInActiveColumns
parameters.description: If in-active columns should be included with row information

200.description: An array of row data from the provided TDM Table

post.description: Allows authorized user to add new Row.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth2 token as Bearer type

parameters.name: tdmTableId
parameters.description: TDM Table ID to add row

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Row Information

200.description: Row id of inserted row, unique to this table

delete.description: Allows authorized user to truncate a TDM Table.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth2 token as Bearer type

parameters.name: tdmTableId
parameters.description: TDM Table ID having these rows

200.description: Count of rows deleted, if successful = 1

get.description:

parameters.name: includeInActiveColumns

200.description: An array of row data from the provided TDM Table

get.description: The TDM rows endpoint returns the requested tables row.

parameters.description: OAuth2 token as Bearer type

parameters.name: tdmTableId
parameters.description: TDM Table ID having this row

parameters.description: Row ID to retrieve

parameters.description: If in-active columns should be included with row information

200.description: An single row from the provided TDM Table

put.description: The TDM rows endpoint updated the requested tables row.

parameters.name: tdmTableId

parameters.description: Row ID to retrieve

parameters.description: Updated Row information

200.description: The count of updated rows

parameters.description: Row ID to delete

tdmTableOwner.description: User name of the TDM Table owner

tdmTableDescription.description: Description of the TDM Table's purpose

maxColCount.description: Max allowed number of columns in table

maxRowCount.description: Max allowed number of rows in table

accessLevel.description: Current users access level to the TDM Table

publicAccess.description: If anonymous access is granted to the TDM Table

archiveEnabled.description: If an archive table is needed

expireSeconds.description: number of seconds token was valid when created

tdmTableDescription.description: Description of the TDM Table's purpose

dbEngine.description: Database used for table storage (Mongo or MySQL)

publicAccess.description: If anonymous access is granted to the TDM Table

archiveEnabled.description: If an archive table is needed

active.description: If the table is ready for use
If the column is ready for use

ID.description: System autoincrement column, only send for updates

column1.description: User defined column name 1, spaces in column names must be replaces with underscore '_'

column2.description: User defined column name 2, spaces in column names must be replaces with underscore '_'

rowId.description: Row id unique to this table

columnName.description: Unique column name in this table

unique.description: If the column should be unique in the table

indexed.description: If the column should be indexed

required.description: If the column should be required

active.description: If the table is ready for use
